usage: resistance-training exercises for burning fat and building muscle
key_features: Hold with one hand or two hands
Painted surface for increased durability & corrosion protection
Kettlebell supports a wide range of resistance-training exercises
Made of solid high-quality cast iron for reliable built-to-last strength
ai_description: A black cast iron kettlebell weighing 10KG with a textured, glossy finish. The product features a wide handle designed for secure one or two-handed grip. Packaging highlights include orange text calling out features like 'Solid & Durable,' '100% cast iron,' and benefits for fitness. The kettlebell has a flat bottom for stable storage and a painted surface for corrosion protection. The weight is clearly embossed on the front of the bell.
product_name: Amazon Basics Kettlebell - Cast Iron Resistance Training Weight with Textured Wide Grip Handle - Painted Finish - Black
manual: Professionally crafted kettlebell made from 100% pure cast iron with no material mixing, delivering long-term durability and accurate weight as per international standards. The smooth, seamless cast-iron handle offers a secure, comfortable grip, while the flat, well-balanced base ensures superior ground stability, controlled movements, and safe strength training for both beginners and advanced athletes
